title: Bug 124620: Referenced Parameter icon should be invalid if the parameter in library is deleted
OB: When the report design file is reopened, the icon of the parameter appears unchanged. However, if the same operations are performed on a dataset, the dataset's icon in the report becomes invalid.
EB: Bug 124620: The icon of a referenced parameter should become invalid if the source parameter in the library is deleted.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a library (verify it is successfully created). 2. Delete the source parameter in the library. Expected Result: The icon of the referenced parameter should become invalid.
